name: The worst platformer
description:
I suck at level design

in this game you play as a square and your goal is to die.

but not for no reason as the levels react to your death adding new challenges and opening new paths. i suck at making games so this is going to be really bad plus i had to speed run the jam

controls

A/D to move

SPACE to jump

hope you hate it as much as i hate it

v1.2

fixed jumping

fixed the quit button cause i know you'll want to quit
